snippet: A voluntary plan from British newspapers would give independence and greater authority to a press regulator; the Grammy award nominations are announced; Dave Brubeck dies at 92; and Nickelodeon remakes the "Peter Rabbit" books as an animated series.
abstract: A voluntary plan from British newspapers would give independence and greater authority to a press regulator; the Grammy award nominations are announced; Dave Brubeck dies at 92; and Nickelodeon remakes the "Peter Rabbit" books as an animated series.

headline.main: The Breakfast Meeting: British Newspapers' Regulation Plan; and Brubeck, Jazz Popularizer
